profile.description: 2 years of experience in web development. Passionate about learning new technologies, especially CSS and JS ecosystems for the Front End.

experience.first-job-description: About 1 year of experience doing small jobs as a freelancer.
experience.studies-description: trained as a Doctor of Medicine (MD) at the "Lisandro Alvarado" Centroccidental University

hobbies.first-hobby-description: Since I was very young, music has been part of my essence, especially the piano, I like to play when I have free time.
hobbies.second-hobby-description: Learning a new language is always a good idea. A different language is a different perspective of life, for now I speak English, French and a little German.
hobbies.third-hobby-description: Dancing is a good way to relieve stress, share with friends and make some new ones, and have a good time. I love to dance Latin rhythms like salsa, merengue, bachata, among others.

projects.first-project-description: a dedicated calendar for a work team where its members can add events through reminders, each member can see the events raised by their colleagues, so that everyone is aware of the activities.
projects.second-project-description: A personal diary to capture your experiences, with the functionality of adding images to have visual memories.
projects.third-project-description: A REST server, the idea of the project was a REST API for a supermarket, where its workers, have a role, can handle products, with their respective categories.
projects.fourth-project-description: An application made to manage the order of a queue, an example of an application widely used by banks, among others.
projects.fifth-project-description: an input that users use to search for gifs based on a word or sentence.
